title.english: The Little Lies We All Tell

description:
The school comedy story follows four friends at a girls' school. They may seem like ordinary second-year junior high school students at first glance, but they are a space pilot, a ninja without a clan, a girl with supernatural powers, and a boy in girls' clothes.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Aliens
tags.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Swimming
tags.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

name.first: Necklace ga Hook ni Karamatta Josei
name.native: ネックレスがホックに絡まった女性

node.description: Koutarou Itou is a CG animator working for Sublimation.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.

__[Website](http://kikuyatomoki.com/)__

__Birthplace:__ Mitaka, Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Tomoki Kikuya is a Japanese composer and arranger, who works for music studio Popholic. His brother Kikuya Hiroki (菊谷宏樹), is the director of TVK's saku saku music show.

__Biography:__
Kikuya started a career as guitarist in the music band Mustang A.K.A under Sony Records. Later he was part of Funanori. Starting from 2005 Kikuya decided to focus on working as a music composer and arranger. He has arranged and composed several songs featured in anime since then, starting with theme songs for Pani Poni Dash.

A Japanese voice actress unit formed of [Natsumi Murakami](https://anilist.co/staff/121712/Natsumi-Murakami) and [Chiemi Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/120102/Chiemi-Tanaka).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NACHERRY_STAFF) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nacherry_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCidjZB0LX5l8aKzjLN0-1ZQ)

Currently seated at Studio Z.

Applied to Studio No. 1 as a 15-year-old in the hopes of getting to work with [Yoshinori Kanada](https://anilist.co/staff/106398/), but there were no seats available. She then instead joined [Osamu Kamijou](https://anilist.co/staff/155388/)'s studio.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [younger animator](https://anilist.co/staff/274813/)._
